mapper.select: SELECT C.CUST_ID as custId , DATE_FORMAT(C.REG_DT, '%Y. %m. %d') as regDt FROM FAMILY_CUSTOM FC INNER JOIN CUSTOM C ON FC.FAMILY_CUST_NO = C.FAMILY_CUST_NO AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND FC.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE FC.FAMILY_CUST_EMAIL = '${familyCustEmail}'

SELECT C.CUST_ID as custId , FC.FAMILY_CUST_EMAIL as familyCustEmail FROM FAMILY_CUSTOM FC INNER JOIN CUSTOM C ON FC.FAMILY_CUST_NO = C.FAMILY_CUST_NO AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND FC.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE FC.FAMILY_CUST_EMAIL = '${familyCustEmail}' AND C.CUST_ID = '${custId}';
mapper.update: UPDATE CUSTOM SET CUST_PASSWORD = '${custPassword}' WHERE CUST_ID = '${custId}'
